If cancer is in the nasal cavity, treatment may include the following:          - Surgery and/or radiation therapy.    - Chemotherapy and radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of combination chemotherapy before surgery or radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of combination chemotherapy after surgery or other cancer treatment.
